message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCEPAYMENT_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_PAYMENT_HAS_BEEN_MADE
message.locale: A payment has been made for the date, %1d, the configuration cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCEPAYMENT_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_PAYMENT_HAS_BEEN_MADE
message.locale: A payment has been made for the date, %1d, the configuration cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCEPAYMENT_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_PAYMENT_HAS_BEEN_MADE
message.locale: A payment has been made for the date, %1d, the configuration cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCEPAYMENT_FV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot delete the record, since its already deleted.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCEPAYMENT_XFV_ATTENDANCE_TRACKING_ENABLED_CANNOT_BE_NO
message.locale: Attendance Tracking Enabled indicator is set to 'No' from, %1d, Attendance Required for Payment indicator cannot be set to 'Yes'.
